A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Defenitely the best looking star wars of the new era\, even though somehow it seems not to bring the new trilogy anywhere. Except from Kylo Ren\, no other carachter seems to develop. One thing that Rian Johnson didn't understand is that all this new kind of cheap comedy doesn't fit into this franchise. Leia flying? The same scene could be done 300 times better\, preventing the fans' from raging against this new installment. Let's see how it goes with ep IX
